titleStmt.title: Brutus of Alba, or, The enchanted lovers a tragedy acted at the Duke's Theatre / written by N. Tate.
titleStmt.author: Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.
Virgil. Aeneis Liber 4.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.F. for Jacob Tonson ...,

notesStmt.note: The plan of the play is taken from the fourth book of Virgils Aeneid.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
